arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Luis Enrique and Marquinhos press conference live
arts.sum: This Wednesday at 9 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta at the Parc des Princes on Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. On the eve of this match, Parisian coach Luis Enrique will hold a press conference at 1 p.m. He will be preceded, accompanied, or followed by Marquinhos (31-year-old central defender and […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Kvaratskhelia indoors, a return to training
arts.sum: This Wednesday, Paris Saint-Germain will be at the Parc des Princes to face Atalanta (kick-off at 9 p.m., broadcast on Ligue 1+) as part of Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League. On the eve of the match, the medical update published by PSG revealed that “only” Désiré Doué, Ousmane Dembélé, and Lucas Beraldo are […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Official medical update: 3 Parisian withdrawals announced!
arts.sum: This Wednesday, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face eighth-place Atalanta at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m. CET). After Tuesday’s training session, on the eve of the match, the club provided an injury update. “– Ousmane Dembélé and Désiré Doué continue to receive treatment. – Lucas […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Follow the Parisian training this Tuesday
arts.sum: This Tuesday, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will be training at the PSG Campus at 11 a.m. to prepare for Wednesday evening’s match against eighth-place Atalanta at the Parc des Princes on Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). The club is offering live coverage of the session: Live coverage to follow […]
